attributes.action: Stop the provisoin of gypsy sites in residential areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Burnley council planning have received an application for change of use to a gypsy caravan site in padiham behind residential houses in a heavily populated residential area.

rejection.details: This is a matter for local authorities.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
